flawed_nl_solution:
If $44000 is $1000 less than five times more than he had made on his previous painting, then $44000+$1000 = $54000 is five times what he made on his previous painting.
If $54000 is five times what he made for his previous painting, then he made $54000/5 = $<<54000/5=10800>>10800 for selling his previous painting.
#### 10800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45000, not 54000. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
